Privacy Policy

This privacy policy explains how the BRAINTWIN project website collects and uses information.

Website Analytics

This website may use analytics services to understand visitor behavior. No personally identifiable information is collected.

Cookies

This website uses minimal cookies necessary for basic functionality. No tracking cookies are used.

External Links

This website contains links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites.

Research Data

The BRAINTWIN research project handles patient data according to GDPR regulations and French law. All research data is pseudonymized and processed according to strict ethical guidelines. For information about research data handling, please contact the project coordinator.

Contact

For questions about this privacy policy, contact: braintwin@icm-institute.org

Last updated: January 2025

BRAINTWIN

Brain Research through Advanced INTegration with Wide-scale Intelligent Networks. Building digital twins for precision neurology.
